title: (4600-014) Amarante - 374 Avenida Alexandre Herculano
description: Large free car park with spaces along the Tâmega River. Surrounded by two busy roads but quieter from midnight. Fine for one night. Trash cans in the parking lot.

title: (4600-015) Amarante - 552 Avenida Alexandre Herculano
description: Parking for the joggers and walkers. Certainly not suitable for more than 4 campers, otherwise no place for visitors' cars. Peacefully quiet. Entrance from 1 side can be difficult for longer motorhomes. quiet location at night.

title: (4600-752) Amarante - 188 Rua Bairro Coronel Carvalho de Lima
title_short: (4600-752) Amarante - 188 Rua Bairro Coronel Carvalho de Lima
description: A pretty spot by a rivers by a thermal bathroom and Spa which you must book to find a spot (we didn’t). Probably space for 5 vans. Felt safe and isolated, really beautiful spot with a view to a town and a nearly electric charging spot and the toilets of the thermal bath.

address.street: 188 Rua Bairro Coronel Carvalho de Lima

title: (4600-752) Amarante - 166 Largo Santa Marinha
description: Perfect equipped beach for hot days.

title: (4600-005) Amarante - Avenida Primeiro de Maio
description:
Car park with overnight stays tolerated.
Next to Municipal Market and Market Café. Not possible on market days (Wednesday and Saturday from 04:00 - 15:00.

There are public toilets open from 08:00-20:00 and water may be available inside the market.

Lovely setting beside the river with easy access to the historic town.

Approach car park from the main road bridge. Do not let your GPS try to take you via the old bridge as the turn into the parking is nearly impossible even for our 5m van!

title: (4600-021) Amarante - LUGAR DA CHENTUADA
description: Laundromat in the intermarché car park. Possibility to check tire pressure free of charge.

title: (4600) Amarante - 167 Rua das Carvalhinhas
description: Good shady parking spot. Toilets open at the end of the dirt parking section (closed in Aug 12 for a music event set up). Noisy at the weekend. Close to the river

name: Amarante camping
title: (4600-099) Amarante camping
description: Very nice Camping in a pine forest all amenities.

title: (4600-758) Amarante - 167 Rua Cândido dos Reis
description:
Park very well located, very close to the city, next to the river. Bar next door. departure of walk.
a little movement during the day but no worries.

title: (4600-752) Amarante - 401 N210
description: Ample parking for large vehicles such as trucks, motorhomes, campers ... The ground is dirty but it is a place where you can park both to visit the city and to spend the night. It has no services. Next to it are the municipal swimming pools. Youth movement at night.

title: (4600) Amarante - N15
description: Motorhome wash stations and gas station.

title: (4600) Amarante - 338 N210
description: Place to spend the day or overnight. There is only space for 2 long motorhomes (7 meters), but the place is quiet, 10 minutes walk from the city center. If you can't find another place to park or sleep, this may be an alternative.

title: (4600-752) Amarante - 121 Rua Francisco Sá Carneiro
description: Parking area. 1 minute walk from town. Very quiet area, with bakery, restaurants nearby. We spent one night, no noise.

title: (4600-752) Amarante - 541 Largo Santa Marinha
description:
Small car park directly on the dead end river.
It is sloping. You can reach the village by following the river on a landscaped and very pretty path. On foot or by bike. Nice visit in the city

title: (4600) Amarante - 1012 N210
description: Park near municipality stadium. Easy to park. Exists a restaurant at the local.

title: (4600-593) - 19 Rua José Moura Bastos
description: Tony Restaurant private parking. After an excellent dinner, we asked if we could stay in the restaurant's parking lot and the permit was given with no problem, a quiet place near the Amarante water park

title: (4600) - 521 Avenida Padre João Marques
description: A few places along a cobbled street with little traffic next to the old station which allows you to explore the greenway by bike. No service but a restaurant next door.

title: (4600-752) Amarante - 112 Rua Nossa Senhora de Fátima
title_short: (4600-752) Amarante - 112 Rua Nossa Senhora de Fátima
description: Quiet park. Exists near a big super market, and a restaurant. Very near of N15 road. Safe park and very well iluminated.

title: (4600) Fregim - R. do Tâmega
description: It is the aquapark car park but since we have tickets for the next day I asked if we could spend the night and they told me without problem! Super spacious and super quiet.

title: (4635) Várzea da Ovelha e Aliviada - Unnamed Road
title_short: (4635) Várzea da Ovelha e Aliviada - Unnamed Road
description:
Tranquility,  and magnificent landscape, this is our house at the gates of the beautiful and historic city of Amarante.
We would like it to be a great starting point for getting to know our beautiful region. Here are some suggestions for planning your trip.
We are located 10 minutes from the main node of national motorways that can take you to Porto, Guimarães, Braga, Vila Real, Lamego, Bragança, Chaves and many other cities of great historical and tourist interest. You may use direct public transport for some of them.
Amarante is our city. Small, with a rich historical center, crossed by the river Tâmega, cradle of the conventual sweets and center of a unique wine region, the Vinho Verde region.
And because we talk about wine, of course you can not miss the region of the Douro Valley, a landscape treasure that is the origin of the Port.
If you are nature lovers I have two suggestions of national parks: Gerês and Alvão. And, of course, the mountainous set that will be here in front, in the landscape of the terrace: the Marão.
But we will have an opportunity to talk about all this.
See you later!

title: (4615) - Rua Da Ribeirinha
description: Parque de Merendas. A picnic area, next to the river, perfect for spending the night in peace. There is a toilet, a BBQ and a sink.

title: (4635) Toutosa - 28 Rua Toutosa
description: Nice place in the center of a calm village, shop on the square and a public toilet available.

title: (4600) Aboadela - Unnamed Road
description: Quiet (even though in  vicinity of a road) and nice place with water source and flat surface good for stopping and resting but also for spending a night. Perhaps street lights might disturb a bit. Petrol station some 300m away with the obvious service.

title: (4640) - Unnamed Road
description: At the edge of the dolmens ideal for spending the night .... So calm ....

title: (4640) - Unnamed Road
description: High altitude chapel of great beauty seen clear on the Haut-Douro. Heavy truck 4x4 access. Is it a fire engine route? track recorded on Wikiloc

title: (4600) - 2261 N15
description: Along the river. A picnic area associated with a small tavern with toilets and non-drinking water point. Position for the night side guinguette (validated by locals). For access: paved road. A little narrow but it goes on a path. Warning: the weekend the bar is open in the summer so ... noise to predict.

title: (4600) Ansiães - 342 EM575

title: (4615) Agilde - 437 EM515
description: Parking with overnight, next to Igreja de Agilde. Very close to the miniature village of -casinhas de André Lemos. Very calm and safe.

Serra da Aboboreira.
Banhos publicos chaves no café Marão à Vista

title: (4890) Carvalho - Unnamed Road
description: Simple spot with a very nice view, go up to the chapel. We struggled in this area to find a nice place to land, that's the best we found. It is asphalted, there is a watchtower with a guard, who watches the fires, we asked him if we could sleep there, no problem. Then few tourists this year in portugal because of the covid and few religious festivals, so we don't know how this place is normally.

title: (4640) - Rua Cabo de Vila
description: Free park 24/7 all year

title: (4890) Mota - R. dos Bombeiros Voluntarios
description: Parking in vila da Mota, next to the section of the Voluntary Firefighters section of the Mota, next to a small shopping center. Located in the center of the municipality of Celorico de Basto.

title: (4600) Carneiro - N101
description: Large car park located at the top of the pass. Perfect for a night. Passenger road with a nice panorama. Trash nearby.

title: (4640) Campelo - 18 Rua do Montinhal
description:
New and free motorhomearea.
The service area is new. There are no signs indicating where it is. It is behind the municipal swimming pools and the sports hall.  Three places.

title: (4640) Campelo - R. Abel Ribeiro
description: Very nice place for a picnic. Most pitches are sloping but there is shade. The showers and toilets were very clean. bring paper!

title: (4890) Carvalho - 76 EM616
description: Parking day and night, located in the town of Carvalho, municipality of Celorico de Basto, with restaurant and supermarket. An optimal place to visit the Santuário do Viso and all its surrounding landscape.

description: Piece of land right next to galp gas station (with laundry machines). it's right next to the road but on a much lower level. fine to spend a night.

title: (4890) - 661 EM617
description: Parking park in Borba da Montanha, Celorico de Basto. A lot of boom to park, boom to stay. Secure calm. Cafes and supermarkets. Very nice agricultural area.

title: (4600) Ansiães -
description: Paradisiacal place accessible by a mountain path. we discovered it because we got lost.

title: (5040) - Unnamed Road
description: Spot a little dirty around, but the view has 360 degrees quickly forget this little inconvenience. windy place but it is quite bearable. accessible with any type of vehicle.

title: (5000) - A4
description: Relatively flat parking at the edge of the road but not too busy, possibility of sleeping with a view of the mountains. Bin, wooden table.

title: (4630) Freixo -
description: Louredo’s Farm                                      Organic Farm with parking lot, laundry, hot shower, electricity, point of view, animals, beautiful surroundings, organic food, etc.  We have six very friendly dogs, and they will love you!                                  PS: The entrance can be difficult for very large caravan.

title: (4620) Rio Tinto - 342 N207-2
description: Simple parking 250 m from Caide train station to take the train to Pinhao. Departure 8:50 arrival 11:37. Return departure 16h23 arrival 18h25. The train runs along the Douro on 85% of the way, beautiful! And in the opposite direction Porto is 40 minutes.

title: (4600) Carneiro -
description: Small esplanade of dry grass along an isolated path. Very little traffic. A bit windy but great view

title: (4890) Celorico de Basto - 252 Avenida João Pinto Ribeiro

description: Park of the station. Bath houses open all day, with drinking water. In the center of Vila de Celorico de Basto. Ecopista along ideal for what we like to walk or ride a bicycle.

name: Camping and Caravanning of Celorico de Basto
title: (4890) Camping and Caravanning of Celorico de Basto
title_short: (4890) Camping and Caravanning of Celorico de Basto

title: (4890) - 490 N618
description: Municipal market of Celorico de Basto. tem public toilet. Fair every Saturday. It works there to disco market. Do not stay overnight on weekends and holidays.

title: (4890) - N618
description: Public parking lot, in front of the municipal swimming pools and the residential CAO. Safe and secure place. Ideal for spending the night and visiting Vila de Celorico de Basto., and all or council. Taste da boa gastronomy.

title: (4630) - 2633 N210
description: Quiet place in the aisles. Park and stay next to the houses next to the church at the door. But if it is closed there is another one opposite which is wide and open.

title: (4640) Mesquinhata -
description:
Paved road leading to a motorable track, more for Vans and vans, with small spaces on the side to spend a cool and quiet night, almost at the top of the hill, in the middle of the pampas...
distant view of the Douro Valley.

name: Quinta da Magantinha
title: (4620-620) Quinta da Magantinha
description: In this wine estate which is also a bed and breakfast, you can take advantage of closed and secure parking. Sufficient space for motorhome, van, car. A breakfast can be offered to you. Send a message to find out availability before coming.

title: (4820) São Gens - Rua do Viso
description: Monte da Sra do Viso, Celorico de Basto, with a spectacular view of the surrounding villages. Lots of shade and lots of space. Ideal to enjoy all spaces. Serra do viso. Lots of good accessories.

title: (4640) Porto - N101
description: This parking is interesting because it has a source of drinking water. The locals come to use it.

title: (4630) Paredes de Viadores - M584
description: Very well organized picnic area! Large car park with two entrances, without stripes. So also long campers ok. It is close to the road, so I don't know if there is any noise from cars in the evening. Excellent for a daytime stopover, with tables and grill available. Field to play. Public toilets from the main entrance. Super quiet. Maybe over the weekend it will be busier.

title: (4890) Caçarilhe - 2 EM616
description: Small car park near church to avoid on Sundays, calm and quiet

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Pont Medieval
description: Small car park allowing access to a natural swimming pool, 20m below. The place is idyllic. Please note that the street is narrow and suitable only for vans

name: Camping Mondim de Basto
title: () Camping Mondim de Basto
description: Very pleasant campsite full of nature possibility of service around the toilets. no pool but possibility of swimming at the river

title: (4620-696) Lousada - 1 Rua General Humberto Delgado
description:
Only Vehicles <3500 kg

Paved and illuminated parking lot (50x200 mtr) in the center of Lousada.  Opposite municipal swimming pool and fresh market.  Slightly inclined and close to a traffic road.  Lots of high trees.

title: (4640) Santa M.nha do Zêzere - 131 Rua 20 de Junho
title_short: (4640) Santa M.nha do Zêzere - 131 Rua 20 de Junho
description: A big square with lots of parking slots. Next to the parking area is a playground, soccer field, a park with benches and a bar. The road is closed, but you can still enter to the square.

title: (4880) Ermelo - N304
description: Space for about 4 vans on the level. At Pentecost we were alone. Place surrounded by nature. Infrastructure looks deserted.

title: (4890) Veade - Rua da Igreja
description: Church of Veade parking lot. Very peaceful small church with view of the vineyards. toilets and small water fountain. Did not spend the night but wouldn't see it as a problem.

name: Camping "Quinta das Corujeiras"
title: (4640) Camping "Quinta das Corujeiras"
description: Camping "Quinta das Corujeiras" A campsite offering only one place for a small van, rather difficult to access but in the middle of the vineyards: reservation highly recommended. Great location with hammock available. Showers and toilets very clean. No services for camper. Very welcome with proposal for a ride in the middle of a river to reach a small waterfall. Bread order possible.

title: (4880-258) Mondim de Basto - 183 Rua da Quinta
title_short: (4880-258) Mondim de Basto - 183 Rua da Quinta
description: Car wash station and laundromat at the Intermarché. Ideal for parking

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Rua Nova
description: Parking of the cemetery behind, not perfectly flat but quiet with a nice view.

title: (4610) - 2078 CM1160
description: Parking of the monastery "Santa Maria de Pombeiro" Overnight possible.

title: (4560) Penafiel - 413 Rua Vista Alegre
description: Laundry Self Service

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto - 236 Rua do Caminho da Ponte
title_short: (4880) Mondim de Basto - 236 Rua do Caminho da Ponte
description: Nice haven of peace. Possibility of parking at the end of the car park, or at the back, closer to the water. Slightly sloping parking. Be careful, the incline is too steep to access so cars or vans only. Access seems too complicated for motorhomes or vans. There is water but not drinkable. Possibility to swim in this beautiful river and make beautiful dives!

title: (4890) - 50 Rua da Feira
description: Public parking lot, with toilet open all day. In the center of Vila de Fermil de Basto. Calm and secure.

title_short: (4880) Mondim de Basto - 10 Rua Comendador José Augusto Álvares de Carvalho

address.street: 10 Rua Comendador José Augusto Álvares de Carvalho

title: (4560) Penafiel - 239 Avenida Zeferino de Oliveira

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Rua Monte Nadouro
title_short: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Rua Monte Nadouro
description: Super cozy private spot, directly on the river, quiet and sorrounded by nature, stayed there for 4 nights without a problem, there is even a little "beach" in the back - very lovely spot.. Even if there is a bit of rubbish on the sides, because some people are just stupid, we just collected it, please do so too, no matter where you are :-)

title: (4560-496) Penafiel - 285 Rua Província de Pontevedra
description: Quite a large parking lot in front of a sports field with about 25 spaces, also suitable for larger campers. Ideal for families with a skate park and playground. Directly opposite, very cheap and family-friendly pizzeria with its own play tower for children and air conditioning! We stood very quietly 1 night.

title: () Mondim de Basto - EM1189
description: Free service terminal with possibility to stay 72h, attention not accessible the first weekend of August cause big party on the parking lot. Free electricity, do not overuse.

title: () Pardelhas - N304
description: Superb corner in Do Alvao Park. Maximum two places on this site. In the middle of nature, at an altitude of 1000 meters. Water point.

title: (4640) Baião - N211
description: A small dirt parking lot can be level ready along the river Douro. A spring water source of the mountain. No development. Apparently very calm.

title: (4640) Ancede - 173 Rua do Cruzeiro
description: I discovered this watering hole along the rota de romanico. The water tastes good and you can probably even wash clothes and/or dishes here. There is a large parking lot opposite.

title: (4890) - Unnamed Road
description:
Praia Fluvial de Fermil de Basto.  Nature reserve at the stream 'Rio de Veade'.  Parking on a large surface with fine grit under the trees, possibly up to the stream in which you can enjoy pawing.

Beach is on the other side with restaurant 'Balaia Bar da Praia' / toilets. Open only in summer.

title: (4560) Penafiel - Rua Zona Indústrial II
description: Intermarché with gas station, air, water and laundry.

title: () Paços de Gaiolo - N108
description: Great view of the Douro. On the N-108 road.

title: (4820) Rego - 2054 N206

title: (4640) Baião - Unnamed Road
description: Heavenly place with a beach by the river. Three picnic tables, but no shade. Ideal for a swimming day.

title: (5040) Mesão Frio - 305 Caminho Jardim
description: Small parking lot, we just landed kk instant but possible to sleep I think, pleasant.

title: (4660) Resende -
description: A small road that runs along the Douro on the left bank. A few narrow places. For a van, it's ok but the U-turn remains complicated. Nearby there is a pier for boats, and there is more room. The place is beautiful.

title: (4660) Miomães - 1862 N222
description: Parking in the marina, in front of the office of tourism, near the hot spring and baths. Games for children. Great view of the Douro, quieter than near the bar. Empty parking lot off season (March).

title: (4560) Penafiel - 233 Travessa Atafona
description: On the edge of a new road not yet frequented enough, very nice view, quiet, ideal for one night

description: Here it is possible to refill refillable autocaravana gas bottles with propane.

title: (4660) Miomães - 68 Avenida Doutor Correia Pinto

title: (4560-221) Marecos - n.º1279 Rua de Santo André
title_short: (4560-221) Marecos - n.º1279 Rua de Santo André
description: Magikland parking is a very wide esplanade of land to be able to leave the AC while you visit the amusement park with the children

title: (5040) Matos - Bairro Doutor Sá Carneiro
description: Miradouro of São Silvestre Cimo do Douro. At the end of a very narrow and very steep road (only for small vehicles). Extraordinary panorama and calm. If you are not the first, be the second ... after that would be too crowded :-) No services, provide water ...

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto -
description: Quiet place for one night. The descent here is a bit steep and narrow, but also manageable with larger vehicles. A little further down is a river that is safe to use for cooling off in summer. You can start various hikes from here and the trees also offer shade. The night was extremely quiet, almost no cars drive along here.

title: (4560) -
description: Great paved spot by the water with shadows and picnic areas. A bar open until midnight can cause a bit of noise at night, but it's also a great place to have a beer.

title: (4880) - EM1347
description: Picnic Area of Ponte dos Cavacos

title: (4560) - Rua do Salgueiral
description: Small earthen car park just above the spot on the edge of the Drouo. No service but allows you to spend a quiet night away from the bar which al ere to sing all evening on this Saturday. Place flat and quite far from the road. So pretty cool

title: (5040) Sedielos -
description: Good area in the middle of the Douro next to the Marão mountain range with beautiful ladscapes. Be sure to visit the Pituda leisure Park with beautiful river beach.

title: (4660) Miomães - 140 Rua de Vila Nazaré
description: Clean drinkable water

title: (4890) - N210
description: Parking near a small church in the center of a small village. We had a very quiet night. In the morning it is nice to see the beautiful panoramic view.

title: (5040) Mesão Frio - N101
description: We stopped by chance on this parking near the cemetery, calm assured! Go to the bottom of the car park, breathtaking views of the Douro Valley. The village is above.

title: (4560) Penafiel - 9293 Rua Victorino da Costa
description: Big parking located in the town center

title: (4560) Penafiel - Variante Cavalum
description: Free parking next to a beautiful park. Very quiet and beautiful area right next to the Magikland amusement park. Toilets opened from 9:00 till 19:00, 250 m from the parking (behind the bar in the park)

title: (5040) Vila Jusã - 614 N108
description: Magnificent source of drinking and fresh water with parking space. Although it does not have a sign, the neighbors have told us that it is drinkable.

title: (5040) Gafaria - N108
description: View point parking with a small buffet

title: (4660) Resende - 813 Rua José Monteiro
description: The view is great, but there is a lot of traffic and it can be very busy on working days, as it is very used by locals

title: (4690) Oliveira do Douro - N222
description: Picnic area with grill at the viewpoint

name: Quinta do Rio - Natuurcamping
title: (4890-140) Quinta do Rio - Natuurcamping
description: An incredibly idyllic campsite on a river, far away from civilisation. The last part of the path that leads there is only gravel and quite steep in some places. Also the last 3 km of directions from google maps is not correct but there are signs pointing the right way. The owner is Dutch and built everything here piece by piece, because previously there were only terraced vineyards here.

title: (4560) Penafiel - Rua da Igreja
description: Overnight parking without services, ideal for visiting the Magikland

name: MICROCAMPING AT LAVOURA DA BOUÇA FARM
title: (4890) MICROCAMPING AT LAVOURA DA BOUÇA FARM
title_short: (4890) MICROCAMPING AT LAVOURA DA BOUÇA FARM
description:
Microcamping, at "farm" private terrain. At our farm you can park one or two motorhome (small size), and enjoy shade and free animals. If you have a tent can alo camp near bouças. Mostly apple, we have the best organic applejuice, no sugar or conservatives added. Also can enjoy country nature, sheep's and geese on the wild. We have a swing by the lake. Can visit and bathe at our rivermill. We have other places to park. 
for reservation please call or check the web.

name: MICROCAMPING AT REQUEIXO TERRAIN
title: (4890) MICROCAMPING AT REQUEIXO TERRAIN
description: Microcamping, at "Requeixo" private terrain. Park for one or two motorhome (bigger vans), at lupine farming. Nearby "lavoura da bouça - fruta bio" farm. Can visit rivermill, bathe on river, enjoy countryside. Taste our 100% organic applejuice (no added sugar niether conservatives), and enjoy the wild sheeps, geese, swing, and other places nearby, organic products, applejuice. Also have a parked caravan for support. For reservation please call or check the website.

title: (4880) Ermelo - Unnamed Road
description: Starting point to the waterfalls 'Fisgas de Ermelo'

name: MICROCAMPING AT KIWIS-RIBAS
title: (4890) MICROCAMPING AT KIWIS-RIBAS
description: Microcamping, at "kiwis - ribas" private terrain. At ribas you can enjoy private, exclusive nature. For summer/ sunny season. With one or two places for small motorhome (van type)*. Can enjoy river with different small depths, barbecue area, small lake, cascade, kiwis shadow, solar shower, electricity. Exclusive and few people. Only reserved per group. For reservation contact first. (*if with a bigger motorhome and limoeiros house is available, you can park bigger van there, and camp on the valley. The street valley with high slope, more adaptable for smaller vans. access requires experienced driver). Can visit our farm, organic producst, applejuice, wine, rivermills, nearby.

title: (4660-206) Resende - 35 Bairro Lapa e Nápoles
description: I was looking for a place far from civilization, and it's great, I'll have dinner on the street and stay until tomorrow.

title: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Rua da Senhora da Graça
title_short: (4880) Mondim de Basto - Rua da Senhora da Graça
description: At an altitude of almost 1000m, the view is breathtaking at 360° over the entire region. Lots of people during the day on weekends. We spent a solitary and very quiet night. It is a starting point for paragliding.

title: (4560) Penafiel - 43 Rua Dom Inácio e São Caetano
title_short: (4560) Penafiel - 43 Rua Dom Inácio e São Caetano
description: Gala station for LPG

address.street: 43 Rua Dom Inácio e São Caetano

title: (4880) - Unnamed Road
description:
Amazing Parque/picnic area.
benches
barbecue
toilet
shade
water filling spot

title: (4880) - Unnamed Road
description: Shaded picnic area with water

title: (4690) Cinfães - CM1022
description: Above the dam that you can cross, on a connecting road over the Duro to the north! Quiet at night, around 6 o'clock the rush hour starts! Then it gets louder! Flat place!

name: Parque de Campismo de Mourilhe
title: (4690) Parque de Campismo de Mourilhe
description:
Mourilhe motorhome parking, camping and glamping, providing everything for a 5 star stay next to Douro River.
Prices start at 20 euros per night for a motorvan with 2 people and eletricity. 

Full price list at website

Motorhome Park | Bungalows | Restaurant | SPA | Gym | Swimming pool | Convenience store

title: (4880) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking of a pretty little church, with a beautiful lighting of the church at night. Parking without lamppost.

title: (4690) - CM1022
description: Picnic area at the edge of a small waterfall, tables, toilets, water point, bardecue. Beware, this place is on the road but not very busy. The TOP for a lunch, swimming, walking along the brook ...

title: (4660) bernardo - 914 EM537
description: Picnic area on the banks of the Douro with: toilets (whitewater), barbecues in free access, drinking water and even a small private beach! Access "Cais de Bernado"

title: (4820) Fafe - 79 Rua de Oleiros
description: Picnic area with 6 tables, tables and a double barbecue. Little shade but to make a stop on the way to eat is great.

title: (5040) Vila Marim - N108
description: Parking at the water's edge with a nice view. Surely quiet on weekdays but beware on Saturday night till 04.00 music in  the bar nearby. Toilets and showers available in self service.

title: (4890) - 1245 N210
description: Very safe park. Near exists a market and a coffe. Exists a old railway station near and a path to Walk.

title: (4890) Gandarela de Basto - 308 N304
description: Very well located parking space. Calm and secure.

title: (4690) - Rua de Torneiros
description: Flat concrete parking with a view of the Carrapatelo dam. The parking lot is now closed. Great views over the river. Water can be found when you leave the main road 500 meters from the car park.

title: (4625) - 1522 N108
description: Parking below the paved church. We settled in 3 motorhomes between 6 m to 7.50 m for picnics. Possibility to turn around. Water but toilet closed. We did not stay for the night.

title: (4660-344) S. João da Fontoura - M5
description: Parking with possibility to fill water. Not sure for 100% that it’s drinking water, but looks good, with good pressure and connection. There are narrow roads to access this point, can be difficult for wider camps. (Our is 2,4m)

title: () - EM552
description: Picnic area on the banks of the Douro, free parking, catering possible at the bar-restaurant in the village of Porto de Rei. Water point, swimming in the river possible or swimming pool.

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Parking that is taking a small road at the dam. There is a steep slope to go. A small concrete parking and another further down made of sand. We were on the second with our heavy weight. Opportunity to dive your feet in the Douro following the path at the end of the second parking. Do not be afraid of the way, it's pretty rocky. 5 minutes walk

title: () - Unnamed Road
description: Great place for a night of absolute calm, this has been a real pleasure for us. There are toilets but closed that day, a water tap, is she drinking? Plenty of room. A stone stairway leads to a remarkable views of the Douro Valley. The site is perfectly accessible to the motorhome by narrow roads but passes it hassle-free.

title: (5030) - CM1244
description: Praia Fluvial de Fornelos, free public parking.

title: (4690) Cinfães - 23 Rua São Sebastião
description: 20 car parking spaces near a municipal football stadium. flat car park.

name: Camping Quinta Valbom
title: (4890) Camping Quinta Valbom
description: A beautiful campsite in the mountains. One hour from Porto. Very friendly owner. Places very well maintained with a beautiful view and with orange, olive and lemon trees. The sanitary facilities are old, but clean! It's really worth it for some quiet nights in the middle of nature :) (unfortunately a very steep approach, could be a problem for big motorhomes)

title: (4580) Bitarães - 342 Rua D`Além
description: A parking lot at the edge of the road which is nothing exceptional but which has the merit of being flat and with a lot of parking spaces (parking lot in 2 parts). We spent one night there and apart from the fact that there are quite a few passing cars, we weren't bothered.

title: (4625) Penha Longa - 3450 CM1276
description: Nice place on the banks of the Douro River.  Accessible up to 100 meters from the water's edge.  A small pier with the possibility of fishing and canoeing.  A small corner with a place for barbecue and a picnic table.  Also accessible to large motorhomes, a pleasant place for a stopover. Easy to get there and easy to leave.

title: (4660-034) Fundo de Vila - 15 Rua da Boa Vista
title_short: (4660-034) Fundo de Vila - 15 Rua da Boa Vista
description: Water point on the church square. Uncontrolled water

title: (4625) Favões - Unnamed Road
description: River beach, very peaceful and cleaned. A lot of people camping over night. Ideal for relax, take sun and swimming. The access is steep not ideal for the biggest campervans.

title: (4690) Cinfães - 1 Rua Santa Bárbara
description: Large parking at the entrance of the city. All shops nearby

title: (4810) Calvos - 1541 Rua da Lapinha
description: Picnic area next to a sanctuary with parking spaces suitable for long vans. Fountain with drinking water and rubbish bins. Very calm.

title: (4820) Fafe - 77 Praceta de Sá
description: Large quiet public car park for one night close to the town center nearby trade

title: (4810) Calvos - 350 EM579 2
description: Parking in the ground, near the Lapinho sanctuary. No services, but the possibility of spending the night. View of the valley. Only concern, the sanctuary rings every hour ...?

title: (4560) Guilhufe - Rua de Subpena
description: Free service area, overnight possible but too close to the road, possible spaces just below but not tested.

title: (4890) Celorico de Basto - Unnamed Road
description: Nicely located place with tables & benches, small playground, a grill and drinking water. A path goes down to the river... The road 1.5 km (gravel) no asphalt in itself is OK but it goes steeply down and steeply up again

title: (4690) Cinfães -
description:
If you are visiting Northern Portugal, we also invite you to our paradise. Our land is 1.3 hectare big where you can park during the day and night although it is accesible mostly only with motorbikes, cars and vans because there is a 265cm wide bridge before our place which has a little bend too. But if you come without a motorhome, you can sleep here also in a tent under the starry sky. 

If you travel with your pet, he/she is welcome here too, just let us know before you come, because we also have two dogs. 

As for the toilet, we have only one compost toilet, what you can use as well. In addition, we provide water but the drinking water is limited because we bring it from a fresh spring nearby. At the moment, for electricity, we have only a solar system, which is also limited, we can charge just the usual devices with, like phones, laptop, etc.
Anyway, if you have some extra request, let us know, because we have hammocks, slack line, picnic table and cooking stuffs, like camping gas etc, what we can also offer.

If you got interested, come and swim under the waterfalls, relax and clear your mind in the nature, enjoy the sunset from a panoramic view and let's explore Cinfães and the beautiful Douro valley with its amazing features. 
The surroundings also offers many activities such as boating on the Douro river, hiking or biking in the embrace of majestic mountains, looking round the marvellous wine region, walking around the cobbled streets of the fabulous small cities and villages and much more programs.

The price applies to one vehicle and one person per night.

title: (4880) - Unnamed Road
description: Parking in front of a chapel in the middle of town. We stayed here after we were kicked out of the natural park. Quiet area and close to the Pozas de Ermelo

title: (4820-178) Fafe - 401 Rua Cidade de Guimarães
description: Self-service washing machine. 19 kg. 7euros 11 kg. 4 euros. dryer 1 euros. parking leclerc.

title: (4815) Vizela - 629 N106
description: Optimal quiet park to visit Parque das Termas de Vizela. Pingo Doce supermarket, 100m away.

title: (4580-127) Paredes - 23 Rua Dona Rosalina Guimarães
description: Large parking area in the village, a little inclined.

title: (4580) Paredes - 14 Avenida João Paulo II
description: Large car park near the center of Paredes with many shops, quiet on weekends. Free without service..

title: (4880) Bilhó - M1200
description: Time for a break ! Small parking close to a waterfall with possibility to ”swim” and enjoy the sun !

title: (4660) São Martinho de Mouros - 516 Rua do Monte do Calvário
title_short: (4660) São Martinho de Mouros - 516 Rua do Monte do Calvário
description: In the middle of the mountains in the Douro valley In the parking lot of a religious building overlooking the valley possibility of staying for a meal break. Thank you for leaving the place spotless, it is a religious place

title: (4805) Tabuadelo - 244 Rua de São Cipriano
description:
A magnificent place surrounded by nature in the countryside but close to the urban center of Guimarães. The owner allows walks through the surrounding woods.
The site has a black and grey discharge center and a water charging point.
There is a cafe and grocery store very close and a supermarket less than 5 minutes away with a gas station.
The owner is still carrying out the construction of the space but already allows its use.
Contact: 960085233

title: (4690) Cinfães - CM1023
description: Nice picnic area in the forest of Parque do Lodario with several small picnic areas with tables and chairs. Sufficient shade. Fresh water available and rubbish bins at every place. About 100 meters downhill there are more table sets at several pools and a view of the valley. Approach on paved road but steep. Parking at the roadside.

title: (5040) Fontelas - N108
description: Caldas de Moledo Thermal Resort. There is parking at the entrance to the park which is free, pleasant and safe. Enough shade at Rio Douro 200 meters away.

title: (5000) Vila Real - E82
description: "Barragem do Sordo" Calm place with a dam surrounded by mountains. Restaurants nearby. Easy access to the highway. Beautiful spot for lunch and a swim. Road was a little steep and gravel but it you take it slow it is very achievable and heaps of space to turn at the bottom. worth it!

title: (4575) Quebrada - 153 Rua de Barco do Souto
title_short: (4575) Quebrada - 153 Rua de Barco do Souto
description: Small parking lot with some picnic tables very quiet

title: (5000) Galegos Da Serra - EM1214
description: Park/picnic place with magnificient view on Vila Real.

title: (4690) - 88 N222
description: Tap for filling the water tank on a small picnic area

title: (4880) - 1973 EM1191-1
description:
This is a place allowed by the Alvão Park. We where sent here by the guard. It’s a market place in a village called Bilhó. 
==
Este local é autorizado pelo Parque do Alvão, fomos enviados pela Guarda para aqui após termos sido apanhado junto à capela.

title: (4575-580) Valpedre -
description:
Recently built, beautiful and calm place with all facilities for motorhomes.
Washing basins, bathrooms and showers available. Secure Wi-Fi service. Not possible to use hotel amenities.

title: (4810) Infantas - 189 Travessa 24 de Junho
description: Quite location by the wood on meadow. Hard to camp anywhere around. No service here.

title: (4810) Guimarães - N101-2
description: Free camper pitch, only for parking

name: Parque Campismo de Penha
title: (4810) Parque Campismo de Penha
description: Great campsite with pool and restaurant. Very friendly staff. Shaded and in the trees. At the top of the gondola/cable car so perfect for visiting this beautiful little town and the rock structures of Penha.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 56 Rua Monte de Santa Catarina
title_short: (4810) Guimarães - 56 Rua Monte de Santa Catarina
description: Just outside the entrance to the official camping (Parque Campismo da Penha) is a relatively large parking lot with convenient parking spaces of no fixed length. Lots of shade. Avoid driving uphill from the north (Quintas) as there are steep inclines and narrow streets. Better access if you drive from near Guimaraes center. Public toilets are a short walk away towards the main car park and church (unknown opening hours).

title: (4575) Rio de Moinhos - 543 Rua Souto
description: Large parking lot, empty all day. At night a bit of passage because the young people meet here, but it remains calm. The view is very nice, and if you have any concerns there is a great mechanic nearby. Quite a few strays though, so my dogs spent quite a bit of time barking. There is a park 20min walk away, and the douro is 30min away. There is a hiking trail that starts from the town. Attention, no shade, spot exposed from 09:00 to evening. And quite difficult to access because narrow street and people park there. My cc is 2m15 wide, and 6.80 long: that was right.

title: (4810-000) Guimaraes - Unnamed Road
description: On the road to the campsite, 200 meters before arriving at the parking lot, you will find a path that goes down to a picnic table. If you ever miss the path you will see the spot which is just below the road. We spent a very good night there in peace and the next day we took advantage of the shade of the trees and the walks and monuments nearby. The spot is only accessible for one small van.

title: (4810) Guimaraes - R. das 3 Bicas
description: Semi-quiet, many couples go up, good to spend the day, safe, incredible views

title: (4810) Guimarães - 9 Rua Nossa Senhora da Penha
title_short: (4810) Guimarães - 9 Rua Nossa Senhora da Penha
description: Parking easily accessible and with a lot of shade. It is a very quiet and endearing area just 10 minutes from Guimaraes.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 17 N101-2
description: Below another car park opposite the restaurants, this car park is quieter and better equipped for spending the night. We found a flat spot next to the big rock.

title: (5030) Santa Marta de Penaguião - 41 Alameda 13 de Janeiro
title_short: (5030) Santa Marta de Penaguião - 41 Alameda 13 de Janeiro
description: Parking without service, very nice and quiet. Suitable for any motorhome. We had a quiet night. Shops and restaurants nearby.

title: (4880) - EM1344
description: Surrounded by local nature, including wheat fields, churrasqueira and picnic areas. Quiet enough to spend the night.

title: (4810) Guimarães - 8 Rua Nossa Senhora da Penha
title_short: (4810) Guimarães - 8 Rua Nossa Senhora da Penha
description:
Large car park at the Santuario de Penha. Very nice and quiet
Beautiful Sunset and View

title: (5000) Vila Real - EM313
description: Location close to the road but totally isolated and silent. No services. A few kilometers above Villa Real on which you have a breathtaking view. The path to get there is rather dented and is accessible only to small cars or vans. The place is clean and we are counting on you to do the rest (remember to pick up all your waste including your toilet paper).

title: (4575) Penafiel - 212 Avenida São Miguel
description: Intermarché Termas São Vicente (Penafiel - Porto)

title: (5000) Vila Real -
description: Quiet place with a beautiful view. We stayed 2 nights and would definitely come back.

title: () Santa Marta de Penaguião - 5030 EM601 1
description:
Motorhome service and parking area.
Completely new with everything you need to perform maintenance on your motorhome.
Free parking. Great views.
Very quiet place.

title: (5000) Vila Real -
description: Nice little nature spot next to the dam. The road is in good shape. And the place is sheltered from the wind. You take can nice little walks from the spot

title: (4575) - Caminho da Granja de Matos
description: Lazer Park of Alpendorada. Very good for a stopover, large car park, water point and toilets indicated on the map. Mini football pitch, basketball, fitness trail near the dam on the edge of the Tâmega. Possible night.

title: (5000) Vila Real - EM313
description: Picnic area near the dam water reservoir, in the heart of the national park. Ideal for a short stopover for lunch. No services. It is forbidden to spend the night in the park

title: (4820) Moreira do Rei - N311
description: Drinking water fountain also used by locals. It is very fresh!

title: (5000) Lamas de Olo - EM313
description: Water fountain. The local population fills their big bottle of water. So I guess it's safe to drink. But at least can be used for dishes, shower etc.

title: (5000) Lamas de Olo - EM313
description: Large parking place at the bottom of the beautiful village of Lamas de Olo. Quite and nice, surrounded by nature, walking marked trail (13k), river nearby, drinking water and toilets (next to cemetery). I have no photos though. Worth to spend a night

title: (4575-052) Alpendurada e Matos - F Avenida Francisco Sá Carneiro
title_short: (4575-052) Alpendurada e Matos - F Avenida Francisco Sá Carneiro
description: Large fairgrounds (except fairgrounds - Saturdays)

title: (5050-071) Godim - 6 Avenida Sacadura Cabral
description: There is another laundrette in the street next to that of intermarche, brand new with the advantage of being seated. 1 machine and 2 tumble dryer from .

title: (5050-071) Godim - 6 Avenida Sacadura Cabral
description: Automatic outside laundry with free access a dryer, two washing machines. On the parking lot of intermaché by very practical for the big motorhome.

title: (4575-010) - 10 Avenida de Miratâmega
description: Spacious parking, no camper size limit next to the Municipal Market and Continent Supermarket

title: (4860) Arco de Baúlhe - 13 N210-1
description: Parking at the bottom of a dead end with no traffic, next to a small train museum (free). Very good for an evening and a night. Toilet open from 10h to 19h

title: (4575-003) Várzea - 394 Rua da Cachorrela
description: Parking by Intermarché Alpendorada. Laundry, shop, and gas station.

title: (5100) Lamego - Unnamed Road
description: Place with breathtaking views of the Douro and the valley. Not had the opportunity to spend the night there (just a picnic) but very quiet and relaxing place. No service, antennas and wind turbines nearby.

title: (4560) Paço de Sousa - 24 Rua Egas Moniz
title_short: (4560) Paço de Sousa - 24 Rua Egas Moniz
description: Small parking in front of the GNR, with a small park in front

title: (5100) - N226
description: A small shaded terrace with a superb view of the Douro, the route is little used at night and you sleep perfectly well.

title: (4575) - 636 Rua da Vista Alegre
description: Private villa that offers free water to all motorhomes. Enter the small door of the property and use the hose to supply water. No payment required. The owner provides water from his property to all motorhomes. (door n ° 604)

title: (4690) Souselo - 3138 N222
description: Nice complete area just aside EN 222 at Souselo village, with free services including toilets and showers; each plot has electricity(6A) and fresh water. 8 places for motor homes up to 8m; supermarket and restaurant at 100 m, gas station at 400 m. Picnic tables, playground for children and fitness equipment in the field. Besides place is just aside road, it is at lower level, so traffic noise does not perturb and it is reduced by night. Many thanks to the municipality of Cinfães for this very nice place, with extended view over Douro valley.
